name: Candy Panda Shooting
description:
Classic puzzle game Candy Panda Shooting is coming now.
Guess this time what we bring to you.
Candy Panda Shooting is a magic world of candy panda. There are too much funny waiting for you.
In the Candy Panda Shooting, you simulate a candy panda to pop bubble shooting monster, it looks like classic bubble shooter games, it's a war of bubble.

How to play:
1.Tap the place where you want the bubble to be shoot.
2.To group 3 or more bubbles to make them burst.
Tips: Breaking the bubbles continuously can get points as bonus.
Features:
- Having 350 different and challenging levels to challenge your brain
- Having more than 20 coloring bubbles
- Easy to learn, challenging to master!
- Fantastic graphics, fluent shooting experience

Let's help Candy Panda to shoot bubble monster.
Candy Panda Shooting also can be played when there is no wifi.
Candy Panda Shooting is a real offline game.
So we don't support multiplayer play it online.
You can download it for your kids or girlfriends or old parents.
Raise your finger, simple tap tap the screen,feel the funny we bring to you.
